title: RadImageNet and ImageNet as Datasets for Transfer Learning in the Assessment of Dental Radiographs: A Comparative Study
details: S Okazaki, Y Mine, Y Yoshimi, Y Iwamoto, S Ito… - Journal of Imaging …, 2024
abstract: Transfer learning (TL) is an alternative approach to the full training of deep learning (DL) models from scratch and can transfer knowledge gained from large-scale data to solve different problems. ImageNet, which is a publicly available large-scale …
